attributes.action: ban English clubs playing an extra game abroad due to the environmental impact.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The premier league is not only trying to kill the integrity of the game, but the extra travel by teams and supporters will add to the environmental impact of the league. This should be stopped at all costs as it just a money making scheme and will affect both the environment and the quality of our national game

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
